Row ID.description: Row ID : b'int' : Unique identifier for each row in the store table - Use as a primary key or for data linking.

Order ID.description: Order ID : varchar(50) : Unique identifier for each order - Use for tracking individual orders and customer transactions.

Order Date.description: Order Date : DATE : Date when order was placed - Use for time-based analysis

Ship Date.description: Ship Date : DATE : Date when shipment occurred - Use for analyzing shipping timelines.

Ship Mode.description: Ship Mode : varchar(50) : Shipping mode used by store - Use for analyzing shipping methods and their impact on operations.

Customer ID.description: Customer ID : varchar(50) : Unique identifier for each customer - Use for identifying individual customers and tracking their interactions.

Customer Name.description: Customer Name : varchar(255) : Customer name associated with each store - Use for customer segmentation and profiling.

Segment.description: Segment : VARCHAR(100) : Segment identifier for the store - Use for categorizing stores by segment.

Country.description: Country : varchar(100) : Country where store is located - Use for geographic analysis or filtering by region.

City.description: City : varchar(100) : City name where store is located - Use for geographic analysis and filtering by location.

State.description: State : VARCHAR(100) : State or region where store is located - Use for geographic analysis.

Postal Code.description: Postal Code : varchar(20) : Postal code associated with the store location - Use for geospatial analysis or filtering by region.

Region.description: Region : varchar(50) : Region where store is located - Use for geographic analysis or segmentation.

Product ID.description: Product ID : varchar(50) : Unique identifier for each product in the store - Use for identifying and tracking specific products.

Category.description: Category : varchar(50) : Category classification for store items - Use for filtering or grouping by product type.

Sub-Category.description: Sub-Category : varchar(50) : Subcategory name within a category - Use for filtering and grouping by product type.

Product Name.description: Product Name : varchar(255) : Product name assigned by the store - Use for product categorization and filtering.

Sales.description: Sales : decimal(10,2) : Monetary value of sales - Use for financial analysis and calculations.

Quantity.description: Quantity : b'int' : Quantity of items stored - Use for inventory analysis.

Discount.description: Discount : decimal(5,2) : Discount amount applied to store items - Use for analyzing price promotions and revenue impact.

Profit.description: Profit : decimal(10,2) : Monetary profit earned by the store - Use for financial analysis and calculations.

sample_data.Product Name: Hon Deluxe Fabric Upholstered Stacking Chairs, Rounded Back
Self-Adhesive Address Labels for Typewriters by Universal

store.description: The "store" database table appears to be a sales data repository containing information about customer orders. It stores details such as order IDs, dates, shipping modes, customer demographics (ID, name, segment), geographic locations (country, city, state, postal code, region), product information (ID, category, sub-category, name), and financial metrics (sales, quantity, discount, profit). With a row count of 9,994, this table likely serves as the primary data source for analyzing sales trends, customer behavior, and market performance.
